thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Patricia Williams
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Patricia Williams

author: Patricia Williams
title: Patricia Williams
text:
I had a brilliant trip to Cuba. I loved every aspect of it. It was professional and our guide was amazing, always ensuring everyone was looked after.
I was disappointed in the communication from Australia. It was only a few days before the trip when I called the agent, did I get my instructions for meeting times etc. I had a complaint that my transfer pick up never showed when I arrived in Cuba at the airport and I have not heard back from anyone. That is disappointing not to even have hat acknowledged let alone I paid for a service I didn't Receive . None the less I would do another I trepador tour as I like their values etc.
